title: Sepp Kuss on Human Powered Health closure: ‘It’s sad to see’
content:
The WorldTour superstar raced two years for Rally to help pave the way for European success: 'It’s definitely more complicated now than it was for me a few years ago.'

Read the full article at Sepp Kuss on Human Powered Health closure: ‘It’s sad to see’ on Velo.
author: ahood
